name: linux_process_listening_lort
pattern: {"query": "select p.name, p.path, lp.port, lp.address, lp.protocol  from listening_ports lp LEFT JOIN processes p ON lp.pid = p.pid WHERE lp.port != 0 AND p.name != '';", "interval": 3600, "description": "Returns the Listening port List - ATT&CK T1108,T1100,T1029,T1011,T1041,T1048,T1020,T1071,T1219", "removed": false}
